constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 212 (Wednesday, December 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. SLOTKIN:
H.R. 6198.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article I, Section 8, Clause 3: [The Congress shall
have Power] To regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and
among the several States, and with the Indian Tribes
[Page H7556]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: Continued Support for Afghan Allies Act
